meanings.definition: A person who shares in receiving something.
meanings.sent1: The corecipient of the gift was thrilled to receive it.
meanings.sent2: The corecipient of the award shared the honor with their team.
meanings.sent3: The corecipient of the surprise party was genuinely shocked.
meanings.sent4: She was the corecipient of his kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent5: The corecipient of the scholarship felt grateful beyond words.

meanings.definition: A recipient who is jointly involved in receiving something.
meanings.sent1: As corecipient of the donation, she felt grateful for the support.
meanings.sent2: The corecipient of the grant worked closely with the other recipients.
meanings.sent3: The corecipient of the prize shared a knowing smile with the others.
meanings.sent4: He was the corecipient of the inheritance, along with his siblings.
meanings.sent5: Being a corecipient of the recognition meant a lot to her.
